Body:
p = Pipeline([('a', Identity()), ('b', Identity()), Pipeline([('c',
    Identity()), ('d', Identity())])])
p.apply('_set_hyperparams', ra=None, hyperparams=HyperparameterSamples({
    'Pipeline__c__hp': 3, 'Pipeline__d__hp': 4}))
assert p['Pipeline']['c'].hyperparams.to_flat_as_dict_primitive()['hp'] == 3
assert p['Pipeline']['d'].hyperparams.to_flat_as_dict_primitive()['hp'] == 4
